description: A blockage in the supply leading to the engine is limiting the flow of fuel and the engine's performance is lower than usual
A burning smell permeates the ship
A cable has broken somewhere inside one of the ducts and proves hard to locate
A computer system fries and needs replacing
A constant quiet rattling noise can be heard in many parts of the ship
A crewmember has killed themselves for some reason
A high-pitched humming sound permeates the ship at the edge of hearing
A ladder breaks with one of the rungs snapping
A minor explosion damages part of the ship
A number of petty thefts have happened aboard the ship
A ramp buckles as its being opened or closed
A small fire breaks out in the galley due to an electrical short in the cooker
A virus has infected on of the computer systems, causing it to stop working
A weapon system overloads and causes enough damage to render it unusable until repaired
Acid leaks from a ship's system and damages deck plating
Air pressure is building up inside the ship due to a problem with atmospheric monitors
All lights aboard the ship suddenly go out
An accident occurs in the ship's armory damaging equipment stored there
an automated mechanism fails and punches a hole an interior bulkhead
An automatic hatch keeps opening and closing randomly
An electrical short has gone unnoticed for some time causing several systems to malfunction
An exterior hatch jams and cant be opened
An irritating high pitched whie can be heard on the bridge
Cargo containers or supplies improperly stored come loose during a maneuver damaging part of the ship
Circuit breakers trip in a number of systems after they are affected by power surges
Circuits in some of the ship systems have turned into sand
Coolant is leaking into the engine compartment filling it with unsafe fumes
Crossed and mixed connections are occuring in the communications system, sometimes causing embarrassing situations
Displays on the bridge are showing meaningless garbage
Drugs are missing from the sickbay, apparently stolen for recreational use or sale
There is a problem with the engine that is causing it to be less efficient and use more fuel.
The fans in the air system are not working properly. They are slowing down and speeding up, which is causing the air to circulate unevenly.
Floor plating in one of the corridors breaks
Food has been contaminated with a bacterium making everyone who ate it sick
Fungal spores have got into the ship's ventilation and are growing in the ducts. The spores themselves are hazardous to inhale
Gas from an intruder defence mechanism releases itself into the ship's atmosphere
Gravity levels throughout the ship keep shifting, making the crew queasy
Hydraulics used to open a door hatch or ramp jam and need freeing
In one part of the ship the steel has become rusty
In the small craft bay a vehicle breaks free of its restraints during a maneuver and crashes into the bulkhead
Insects or other small creatures got onboard the ship at one of the stops and are now causing numerous problems
INsulation covering various important connections has disintegrated
Items that are contraband at the next destination are found aboard ship and the ship needs inspection for more
lubricant keeps leaking into a corridor and poses a slipping hazard
Most of the food stores has either been eaten or become rotten. The only things left are barely edible ration packs
One of the airlocks has a faulty seal causing air to be lost through it
One of the communications arrays on the ship's hull malfunctions
One of the crew is afflicted with space madness and starts behaving erractically
One of the exterior hatches sticks open
One of the fuel tanks has developed a leak and is venting into space
One of the lifts jams between decks, requiring repairs to move again
One of the maneuvering jets fires causing the ship's position to change
One of the robts starts to malfunction
One of the ships expert systems starts to behave erratically
One of the ship's weapons activates and starts randomly firing
Part of the hull plating has been damaged and comes loose
persistent and hard to eradicate mould keeps growing in the corners of the ship's surfaces
Potentially hazardous levels of static electricity build up in the ship's atmosphere
Potentially hazardous levels of static electricity build up in the ship's atmosphere
Power systems across the ship experience fluctuations
Radiation protection has failed and radition is leaking into some cabins
Several space suits are damaged and unusable for space work until they are repaired
several spare parts that are need are found to be broken
cargo in the cargo bay turns out to be dangerous
some of the crew have a still for making alcohol, but the last batch turned out to be dangerous
Some of the equipment in sickbay is malfunctioning giving improper diagnosis and treatments
some of the metal in one of the corridors is suffering from a strange type of corrosion, weaking it
Something small, perhaps a micrometeorite or microscopic black hole punches a hole in the ship
spores of a hallucenogenic mould have infected some of the food supply
Steel components in one part of the ship have become magnetized
the air vents keep emitting a nauseating stench
the artificial gravity in part of the ship is fluctuating.
The cameras that display the ship's exterior break
The CO2 scrubbers are failing and CO2 is building up in the ship's atmosphere
the collision warning siren keeps going off even though there is nothing close to the vessel
the communications systems start suffering from a lot of static and interference
the computers memory storage suffers a fault and data is lost
the cooker in the galley is malfunctioning
the database containing leisure materials  is corrupted
The decompression alarm malfunctions
the fire suppresion system activates when there are no fires
heating and cooling in one part of the ship functions erratically
hydroponics bay suffers a blight that kills many plants
the intercom system malfunctions with volume at maximum
the lights throughout the ship are painfully bright and cant be adjusted
the ships drive occaisonally functions erratically causing spurts of acceleration
the ships navigation computer made a plotting error throwing the ship off-course
the ship's recreational facility is malfunctioning
the ship's shower's are workign very erratically
The ship's stabilizers are malfunctioning
The ship's transponder is broken
The ship's water supply has become fouled and the water purifiers are struggling to clean it
the sterilizing unit isnt working properly and items are coming out dirty
the toilets back up and overflow
there's a problem with the displays on the bridge, flickering or not working at all
thick slime is growing inside one of the air vents
tiny biting insects have got aboard
two crewmembers have an argument that lands them in sick bay
unusually high levels of radiation occur in the enge compartment
various metal surfaces throughout the ship give off an electric discharge due to a short somewhere
water leaks from one of the ships systems into the cabins
